Keywords: Avengers , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) REALLY? YOU THINK I COULD PULL IT OFF?: Spider-Man starts the game with the Disney+ #s004 Cloak of Levitation equipped.
THEY'RE NOT ALL GONE: At the beginning of your turn, Spider-Man may generate a bystander on this card not already generated this game.
KEEP SMILING WHEN THEY CAN'T: STOP. When another friendly character is KO'd, after resolutions heal a friendly character 1 click.
I WAS JUST SHOWING HIM THE ORIENTATION VIDEO: Perplex. When Spider-Man uses it to target a friendly character that doesn't share a keyword, until your next turn that character has Spider-Man team ability.
Trade Spider-Man Want Spider-Man

Comments
June 9, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
Utilizing the swapping out with the Captain America allowed Spider-Man to not share any keywards with a few team members. Giving a character access to any copyable team ability is simply amazing (Batman, Police, Wonder Woman and the list goes on...); double perplex, outwit and taxi with multiple targets and precision strike is a steal- plus he can heal up if your tokens get taken out. This piece would be a little better if it had super senses on those two stop clicks but I digress. Versatility with the ability to adapt exploiting your opponents weaknesses; time will tell but I am growing found of this piece and the Uncommon Wanda from this set.
June 4, 2022
pokolo
Should have come with the cloak or even exclusive tokens for his bystanders to justify the increase in cost for the play at home kit. Otherwise, he’s not bad. Double perplex visa his special and scott’s head is great value for 50 on top of everything else he does
May 15, 2022
Goop
The bystanders don't do much other than just die. For 50pts he's ok but there are definitely better Spider-Man options out there.
